mapper.insert: insert into product (product_category, product_name, product_date, product_price, product_quantity) values (#{product_category}, #{product_name}, #{product_date}, #{product_price}, #{product_quantity})
mapper.update: update product set product_category = #{product_category}, product_name = #{product_name}, product_date = #{product_date}, product_price = #{product_price}, product_quantity = #{product_quantity} where product_no = #{product_no}
